analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#87) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#113-120)

LUXREUM.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#204-205) shadows:
	- LUXREUMToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#16-18)

LUXREUM.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#204-205)
LUXREUMToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#16-18)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/43/0x8a853f445ddd23b055e6a2d470e5036fa1605509.sol#87)
